solution_line_template: She spent {num_bell_peppers} x ${cost_per_bell_pepper} = $<<{num_bell_peppers}*{cost_per_bell_pepper}={cost_bell_peppers}>>{cost_bell_peppers} for the four bell peppers.
She spent {pounds_of_meat} x ${cost_per_pound_meat} = $<<{pounds_of_meat}*{cost_per_pound_meat}={cost_meat}>>{cost_meat} for the 2 pounds of meat.
